attributes.action: Make Holiday companies extend free child places for babies born in 2020
attributes.additional_details: Holidays were stopped due to covid, parents have missed out on 2 years of being able to travel on holiday without the cost of having to pay for their baby, we suffered enough through those 2 years allow us the chance to take our children on holiday for free
attributes.background: Currently holiday company's allow children under the age of 2 to travel for free, I would like the government to ask those companies to allow children born in 2020 to travel for free until they turn 3 or 4

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what ages an infant is entitled to free travel are a matter for individual travel companies, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
